2.1 O
hits B-Algo

classification B-Algo

6.2 O
crisp O
and O

ksom O

gains O

13 O
ii O
  O
acknowledgements O
i O
would O
like O
to O
thank O
my O
advisors O
ashok O
samal O
and O
sharad O
seth O
for O
their O
invaluable O
assistance O
with O
this O
thesis O
and O
roger O
kieckhafer O
for O
being O
on O
my O
committee O
. O

specifically O
, O
tf O
- O
idf B-Algo
performs O
the O
best O
when O
n O
is O
small O
( O
e.g. O
, O
n O
< O
20 O
) O
. O

another O
ksom O
extension O
based O
on O
mixture O
models O
is O
the O
generative O
topographic O
mapping O
( O
gtm O
) O
( O
bishop O
, O
svensén O
, O
& O
williams O
, O
1998 O
) O
. O

we O
note O
that O
both O
algorithms O
also O
do O
a O
good O
job O
of O
generating O
compact O
explanations O
( O
fewer O
conjunctions O
) O
because O
they O
both O
generate O
high O
scores O
for O
compactness O
, O
although O
ripper B-Algo
’s O
compactness O
score O
is O
higher O
. O

in O
this O
work O
, O
kernel O
function O
rbf B-Algo
( O
radial O
basis O
function O
) O
often O
delivered O
better O
performance O
and O
was O
applied O
. O

now O
, O
while O
incorporating O
a O
bias O
for O
assigning O
nearby O
sentences O
to O
the O
same O
category O
into O
nb O
and O
svm B-Algo
subjectivity O
detectors O
seems O
to O

2.1 O
algorithm O
  O
here O

embeddings O

for O

objects O
a O
, O

to O
c. O
starting O

( O

) O

the O

) O

) O

2n(b O
) O
) O
( O
1 O
) O

. O

re O
- O

we O

, O

( O
lpp B-Algo
) O
as O
described O
below O
, O
to O
perform O
a O
local O
re O
- O

of O

most O

ranked O
document O
in O
the O

list O
. O

it O
formulates O
an O
inference O
as O
a O
mlp B-Algo
and O
then O
solves O
the O
mlp B-Algo
. O

in O

paper O
, O
we O
study O
how O
to O
efficiently O
use O
lda B-Algo
to O
improve O
ad O
- O
hoc O
retrieval O
. O

in O

5 O
, O
we O
present O
experiments O
using O
bm25f B-Algo
to O
assess O
the O
impact O
of O
a O
different O
document O

model O
on O
the O
experimental O
results O
. O

birch B-Algo
[ O
7 O
] O
uses O
a O
tree O
structure O
that O
records O
the O
sufficient O
statistics O
( O
summary O
) O
for O
subsets O
of O
data O
that O
can O
be O
compressed O
and O
represented O
by O
the O
summery O
. O

. O

the O
curves O
of O

2.1 O
pca B-Algo

20/49 O
faculty O

: O

reaction O

� O
nature O
� O

that O

- O

of O

( O

* O

1 O
… O
… O

species O
n O
products O
* O
definition O
from O
international O
union O
of O
pure O
and O
applied O

. O

this O
section O
reviews O

neat O
algorithm O

. O

system O
recall O
precision O
generic O
0.27 O

0.04 O

: O

. O

fisql O
diverges O
from O
schemasql O
in O
both O
syntax O
and O
semantics O
in O
important O
ways O
[ O
19 O
] O
. O

we O
have O
ever O
developed O
a O

svm B-Algo
classifier B-Algo
where O

audio O
signal O
is O
segmented O
into O
frames O

20 O
ms O
followed O
by O
a O
frame O
- O
based O
classification B-Algo
. O

we O
compare O
against O
three O
baselines O
: O
minimum O
cut O
prediction O
with O
a O
random O
labeled O
set O
, O
label O

, O

learning O

( O
